title: Print, "Lion Hunt", 1730–50
medium: Engraving with etching, some green watercolor washes on paper
inscribed: Signed bottom left: "scotin Le jeune." Preserved are "Daumont" of the address, and most of the privilege note.
description: The lion, battling with dogs, is attacked by a man on an unicorn with a bow and by another on foot with a trident. A third hunter blows a trumpet, at left. The clothes of the rider are decorated with stars. Two trees rise in the middle ground. Landscape with buildings displaying crescents.

tombstone.epitaph: Print, "Lion Hunt", 1730–50. Engraving with etching, some green watercolor washes on paper. 1914-49-6.
